response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000. Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an excellent return on investment while securing a competitive edge in your market. Should you choose to accept this offer, we guarantee a seamless transaction process and unparalleled customer support throughout your journey with our product. I look forward to discussing the details further and welcoming you as a valued partner. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 1100000}
